snippet: A 44-year-old American citizen has been detained in North Korea for a month, a human rights activist in Seoul said on Thursday.
abstract: Korean human rights activist Do Hee-youn says that American citizen Kenneth Bae has been detained in North Korea for a month, addressing unconfirmed reports that have been circulating in South Korean news media for several days.
lead_paragraph: A 44-year-old American citizen has been detained in North Korea for a month, a human rights activist in Seoul said on Thursday.

headline.seo: North Korea Is Said to Hold U.S. Citizen
headline.main: American Citizen Is Said to Be Held in North Korea
headline.print_headline: American Citizen Is Said to Be Held in North Korea
